TEXT.FULLTEXT: Another example of document test with potential nonsense inside due to bad OCR results. I will search for the term "Benjamin Franklin" in order to determine how well the searching really works. Now I just have to test whether the search results will show up if it goes out of the grep window.. Now the question everyone is dying to know the answer to is whether Franklin Benjamin appearing again in the text will cause there to be a second search hit, and for both to be returned in the list of hits.
